about.title: About me
about.description1: I am a web developer with a particular passion for clarity and user-friendliness. I love to come up with and implement new ideas within an internally coherent package, and my workflow makes distinct use of intuition - both my own and the users'.
about.description2: I have always enjoyed technology and creative work on websites. Having turned my dream into a solid knowledge base and a career, I am continually eager to learn more and expand my skills.

skills.title: My skills
skills.continuedLearning2: if you need further skills. I'm always ready to learn.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: An interactive selection of my work

join.description: An app for organising tasks, inspired by Kanban boards.

pollo.description: A simple jump'n run using JavaScript with object-oriented programming. Help Pepe defeat chickens with salsa bottles.
